page.title: 12 RAF ABINGDON FUNCTIONS
page.content: Since 1967 RAF Abingdon has been a REPAIR DEPOT.There were 4 squadrons (sqdrns),1 and 2 aircraft maintainence sqdrns(AMS),repair + salvage sqdrn and an Engineering sqdrn. 1 AMS is responsible for major servicing on Jaguar + Hunters.2 AMS is a new sqdrn formed to do major servicing on Hawks.It came into full operating capacity in 1983. The repair and salvage (RSS) mostly works away from RAF Abingdon. They are responsible for "REPAIR AND SALVAGE " of all the UK's ARMED FORCES fixed wing aircraft. There are also 2 University Air Sqdrns(UAS) at Abingdon.They are the London UAS & Oxford UAS flying Chipmonks & Bulldogs,which teach UNIVERSITY students how to fly. (Graham Clark & Kevin Durrant)
